messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Was the receptionist initially considered a threat?
No, the receptionist was not considered a threat initially.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the Keeper's decision after the investigator lost the pushed roll?
The Keeper decided that the receptionist was allied with the investigator's enemies.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did the Keeper hint at this decision?
The Keeper hinted at this decision by having the receptionist say he had never heard of the investigator.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the receptionist doing on the phone after the Keeper's decision?
The receptionist was speaking on the phone.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What changed the receptionist's status after the investigator lost the pushed roll?
The Keeper added the receptionist as yet another pawn to the enemy.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the status of the receptionist before the player lost the pushed roll?
Not considered a threat
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the consequence for the investigator if he was insane at the time of losing the pushed roll?
Attacking the innocent bystander until he was restrained by hotel staff
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the next thing the investigator was aware of after losing the pushed roll?
Lying on the floor, pinned by a police officer's knee
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was happening to the man nearby after the investigator was restrained?
Being attended to by hotel staff
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to the man nearby after the investigator was restrained?
He had a beaten body
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the investigator?
The investigator is attacked by the Keeper during his bout of madness.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens next to the investigator?
The next thing the investigator is aware of is lying on the floor, pinned by a police officer's knee.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who tends to the beaten man?
Hotel staff attend to the beaten man.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When should the Keeper use the dice?
When there’s a genuine conflict.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skills should be used when there’s a genuine conflict?
Charm, Fast Talk, Intimidate, and Persuade Skills.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be roleplayed as a verbal confrontation?
Verbal confrontations should be roleplayed at the table with much gusto and performance.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skills can be used to determine the difficulty of coercing a non-player character?
Charm, Fast Talk, Intimidate, and Persuade Skills: Difficulty Levels (page 93)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can sometimes win over a non-player character?
A pretty face, a threat, a bribe, and so on
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When can a cult boss be persuaded?
If the investigator inveigles their way into the cult
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When can a non-player character be coerced?
When it might require a pretty face, a threat, a bribe, and so on
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the key factor in persuading cultists?
the right approach
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why is the difficulty level raised to Extreme?
the cultist's motivation
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the Keeper initially approach the cultist?
intimidation
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the starting difficulty level for the cultist?
Regular
